I'm beyond excited for this preview release of the @rstudio IDE - real time swapping between plain text/markdown + #RStats  and formatted text!

Oh... and also:
- #Python objects/dataframes in environment pane
- Multiple source columns
- Command palette
- Rainbow Parentheses https://t.co/KCNunL27zE

Talk all you want about the usefulness of 3D plots, but I think it's a net positive that you can visualize bending spacetime entirely in #rstats ðŸ˜‰
